reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shirt cute, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one noting it's slim but loose enough. The soft fabric and quality receive positive feedback, with one customer describing it as feeling surprisingly higher end. The buttons and color accuracy receive mixed reviews - while some love the buttons, others mention they gap in the chest area, and while some find the color spot on, others say it's not true

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THESE! They are so cute and the quality is better than the Free People version.
items.body: I’m officially on my third one — that’s how much I love these! They are beyond cute and so easy to style. Whether I’m wearing jeans, cargos, or leggings, they instantly pull the outfit together. The fit is flattering, the quality is great, and the style? Effortlessly cool. Honestly, Free People needs to take notes — these are 10 times better. Not only are they more versatile, but they’re also more comfortable and stylish in my opinion. If you’re debating, trust me: just get one (or three)! Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Great shirt, very cute and flattering! I’m a little over six months pregnant and it compliments the bump very well Read more
items.author: Jordan Kenney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dupe top!
items.body: Cute top considering it’s a dupe for big name brand. The color is darker than pictured. Some reviews mentioned to size up one size but I wish I would have stuck with my normal size which is medium. Would like better if it was more fitted on me. Quality is good! Read more
items.author: honestly, nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Sized up as it’s slim fitting. Fits perfect and love the quality and fabric, so soft! Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best, not the worst.
items.body: Cute shirts. Love the buttons. The arms run tight, as I thought they would do I sized up. The chest area was then a little big. The material is not my favorite, but it’s good enough to throw on when it’s a little chilly but not enough for a sweater or sweatshirt. I will definitely wear them this Spring and on chilly Summer nights or keep in the car for places with AC. Read more
items.author: Bryana A. Donohue

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars cheap material
items.body: Not at all what is pictured to be. I thought it was a sweater material and the material is very cheap. Would not recommend! Read more
items.author: Kelly Crane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable. Fits TTS
items.body: Very cute. Love all the buttons. The fabric is soft and comfortable. Washes well and hasn’t shrunk. Fits true to size. I’m in an XS (5’5, 115) Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Comfortable, and True to Size
items.body: I love the quality and detail of this top. It's super soft and comfortable, and it’s true to size. The color and material thickness are perfect as well. I'm very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Araxi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Wine Red, Pink, White, Yellow, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
